episode_event_general_boss_solo/6701_100: Huh? What am I doing here?

Hoopa! What do you think you’re doing? Stop this
nonsense immediately!

C’mon... Send her back to where she came
from alreadyyy...

Shucks... I was right in the middle of a
concert, too...

Did you hear that, young master? The audience
must be in a frenzy about this, even as we speak!

Never fear! I’ll personally escort you back
to the arena immediately!

Buuut...if Lisia was having a concert, wouldn’t it
be, like, kinda weird to be spotted here?
I’ll distract any onlookers with a Pokémon battle!

Sawyer! Ready some cameras! We’re going to
livestream her path back to the concert arena!

We’ll make it seem like it was all part of
the show!

Wow, that sounds amazing! This is gonna be an
awesome surprise!

Hmph. Since you and your fans are all here on
Pasio, that makes you my citizens!
I am the king of Pasio! Follow my lead!
Yeah! This is gonna be sooo much fun! I’ll call it...
episode_event_general_boss_solo/6801_103:
I’ll show them I am the
king of Pasio!
episode_event_general_boss_solo/6801_100: Hoopa’s gone and done it again...

But no matter what problems happen on this
island, I’m the king who’ll fix them all!
